data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Sabha, Libya.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sabha, Libya
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Sabha.

data.section_summary: On average, 22 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Sabha, Libya.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, remind your church in Sabha that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 184 believers in the state of Sabha the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Arab, Cyrenaican people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Arab, Cyrenaican people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Arab, Cyrenaican people is yours.
Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Sabha, Libya.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Sabha, Libya, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sabha, Libya has a population of 116,100.

We estimate Sabha has 184 people who might know Jesus, 2,688 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 113,228 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 630 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 116,100 citizens of Sabha, Libya, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.
